Individual Games Technology Project

A huge proportion of online portfolios are never explored beyond a first glance at the opening page. This module is about producing something spectacular in those opening moments, to encourage the employer to click through and explore your portfolio further. The module aims to provide you with the opportunity to build on skills and areas of interest developed during previous years of study. You will author a written brief that will form the content of this module, in consultation with your supervising tutor.

Learning Objectives:

+  Select and use appropriate research and experimental methods in the formulation of a self-initiated brief within the guidelines of the project brief guidelines handbook.

+  Produce solutions to answer a range of problems within the parameters of your project and to produce an effective brief within the guidelines of the project brief guidelines handbook.

+  Produce and critically evaluate your own work with the aim of informing, improving, and developing your work.

+  Communicate your own work to others.
